emissions.closest_match_explanation: The ingredient '1 lille løg' is a raw onion. The best match is 'løg' because it represents a raw, unprocessed onion, aligning with the least processed option available.
The ingredient '2 fed hvidløg' refers to raw garlic cloves. The best match is 'hvidløg' as it represents raw garlic, which is the least processed option available.
The ingredient '0.5 rød peberfrugt' is a raw red bell pepper. The best match is 'peberfrugt' because it is the most direct and least processed option for a bell pepper.

The ingredient 'olie' is a general term for oil. Among the available options, 'olivenolie' has the highest emission factor and is a common type of cooking oil, making it a suitable conservative estimate.

The ingredient '250 g oksekød' is a general term for beef. The best match is 'oksekød, gennemsnitligt' (average beef) as it is the most appropriate general category for beef when no specific cut or processing is mentioned.

The ingredient '1.5 spsk fajitakrydderi' is a spice blend. Since there is no direct match for 'fajitakrydderi', 'peber, chili' is chosen as a broader category because chili is a common component in fajita seasoning and it is a spice in powder form.

The ingredient 'chilipulver eller flager' refers to chili in a dried, powdered, or flaked form. 'peber, chili, konserves' is a more processed option than 'peber, chili', and since both are viable, the one with the highest emission factor is chosen.
The ingredient '1 dåse kidneybønner' specifies canned kidney beans. The best match is 'kidney bønner, konserves' as it directly corresponds to the canned form of kidney beans.
The ingredient '2 spsk tomatpuré' is concentrated tomato paste. The best match is 'tomatpure, koncentreret' as it directly corresponds to the concentrated form of tomato puree.

The ingredient '2.5 dl oksefond/-bouillon' is a liquid beef broth/bouillon. The best match is 'bouillon, oksekød, spiseklar' (ready-to-eat beef bouillon) because 2.5 dl indicates a liquid form, not a concentrated cube.

The ingredient '11 små majstortillas' refers to corn tortillas. The best match is 'taco shells' as they are a common form of corn-based tortilla product, and among the available options, it is the most similar in nature and processing.

The ingredient '1 portion tomatsalsa' is a processed tomato product. 'tomatketchup' is chosen as the best match because it is a processed tomato product, similar to salsa, and has a higher emission factor than raw tomatoes or tomato juice.
The ingredient '1 avocado' is a raw avocado. The best match is 'avocado' as it is the direct and least processed option available.

The ingredient 'peber' is a general term for pepper. 'peber, sort' is chosen as the best match because it is a common type of pepper used as a spice and has the highest emission factor among the viable options.
The ingredient '0.5 rødløg' is a raw red onion. The best match is 'rødløg' as it represents a raw, unprocessed red onion, aligning with the least processed option available.
The ingredient '2 fed hvidløg' refers to raw garlic cloves. The best match is 'hvidløg' as it represents raw garlic, which is the least processed option available.
The ingredient '300 g tomater' refers to raw tomatoes. The best match is 'tomat' as it is the direct and least processed option available for tomatoes.

The ingredient '0.75 chilipeber' is a raw chili pepper. 'peber, chili, konserves' is a more processed option than 'peber, chili', and since both are viable, the one with the highest emission factor is chosen.

The ingredient '0.5 bdt koriander' is fresh coriander. There is no direct match for coriander. 'persille' is chosen as a broader category because it is a fresh herb, similar to coriander, and is the most appropriate match among the available options.
The ingredient '2 spsk olivenolie' is olive oil. The best match is 'olivenolie' as it is the direct and most appropriate match for the ingredient.
The ingredient 'saften af 0.5 lime' refers to lime juice. The best match is 'lime' as it represents the raw fruit from which the juice is extracted, and it is the most direct match available.

The ingredient 'peber' is a general term for pepper. 'peber, sort' is chosen as the best match because it is a common type of pepper used as a spice and has the highest emission factor among the viable options.
